subject: Re: [R] matrix in data.frame
body:
You need to use I() or something similar. E.g.

A <- matrix(1:6, 2,3)
data.frame(x=1:2, I(A))

X <- data.frame(x=1:2)
X$A <- A

both insert A as a single column.
